ygData.subject: RE: Getting a good item!  and selling it
ygData.msgSnippet: And some read, listen and disagree because they have different opinions. Doesn t make anyone person right,  or wrong.  If everyone agreed on everything this
ygData.messageBody:
And some read, listen and disagree because they have different opinions.
Doesn't make anyone person right, or wrong. If everyone agreed on
everything this world would be very boring :)

> ----------
> From: Abraham Hardjana[SMTP:ahardjan@...]
> Reply To: eqbards@onelist.com
> Sent: Monday, July 26, 1999 10:13 AM
> To: eqbards@onelist.com
> Subject: RE: [eqbards] Getting a good item! and selling it
>
> From: Abraham Hardjana <ahardjan@...>
>
>
>
> On Mon, 26 Jul 1999, John Kim wrote:
> >
> > I don't know what else I can do to prove the point. Maybe I
> > should lie and say I'm wrong just to get this off the list...
>
> As unfortunate as it sounds John, you may have to leave things be and let
> the topic just die. It is unfortunate because you have made some
> extremely valid points, and they have illustrated a reason for the outlook
> of all of my characters. I have given up on the wonderful item
> sweepstakes that are rampant on all servers and have settled down into
> trying to RP and expand my character's background and story. Without the
> hunt for magical items, my drive to gain levels is all but gone. Anyways,
> just wanted to give you a pat on the back. Someone read and listened.
>
> Treilanin Loreweaver Bard of Kelethin (hasn't leveled in 3 weeks)
>
>
>
